General.Name: Henan Zhongyuan Expressway Co Ltd
General.Description: Henan Zhongyuan Expressway Company Limited engages in the investment, construction, operation, and management of commercial toll roads in China. It operates Airport Expressway, Beijing-Hong Kong-Macao Expressway, Zhengzhou-Zhumadian Section, Zhengluan Expressway, Zhengzhou-Yaoshan Section, Zhengmin Expressway, Shangdeng Expressway, Deshang Expressway Yongcheng Section, and Jiqi Expressway. The company also engages in the project investment, investment management, and investment consulting business; real estate development and sales; civil engineering construction; housing rental; and property management businesses. Henan Zhongyuan Expressway Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is based in Zhengzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 100 Nongye East Road, Zhengzhou, China, 450016
